email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a mid-October laycan. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan window? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. Given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $49.50 per metric ton. The laycan window is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $49.50 works for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $49.50 per metric ton and the demurrage terms as discussed. Please send over the contract for signing. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent. I’ll have the contract sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your business, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
